description: Try our easy to follow Sausages With Onion Gravy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sausages With Onion Gravy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve spooned into large Yorkshire puddings, prepared from a Yorkshire pudding mix, accompanied with steamed carrots and broccoli or mashed potatoes.
